full_text:
Fwd: FYI - I'm answering the Hill re: NY Daily News article that published on release of IM Matthews
From Lee Plourde
To James Petucci, (b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
Date 2019/08/15 15:25
Subject: Fwd: FYI - I'm answering the Hill re: NY Daily News article that published on release of IM Matthews
Attachments: TEXT.htm
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) 8/15/2019 3:24 PM >>>
You don't need to answer this Hill reporter below (I will).
(b)(5)
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Public Information Office
Federal Bureau of Prisons
(202) 353 (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) 8/15/2019 3:11 PM >>>
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
(b)(5)
Story:
http://www.nydailynews.com/new-york/ny-inmate-at-mcc-mistakenly-released-after-jeffrey-epstein-suicide-20190815-h2r76qxnfcodp225goyte6y7a-story.html
Reporter: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) the Hill
Question: My name's (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) and I'm a reporter with The Hill. I'm reaching out to see if the BOP has any comment on this report (https://www.nydailynews.com/new-york/ny-inmate-at-mcc-mistakenly-released-after-jeffrey-epstein-suicide-20190815-h2r76qxnfcodp225goyte6y7a-story.html) that convicted bank robber (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) was mistakenly released on Aug. 7; he is still listed as "released" in the "find an inmate" portal as of 10:21 on Thursday.
Proposed Response: (b)(5)
Page 6443
DOJ-OGR-00024414

Fwd: FYI - I'm answering the Hill re: NY Daily News article that published on release of IM Matthews
From Lee Plourde
To James Petucci, (b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
Date 2019/08/15 15:25
Subject: Fwd: FYI - I'm answering the Hill re: NY Daily News article that published on release of IM Matthews
Attachments: TEXT.htm

(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) 8/15/2019 3:24 PM >>>
You don't need to answer this Hill reporter below (I will).
(b)(5)

(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Public Information Office
Federal Bureau of Prisons
(202) 353 (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)

Question: My name's (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) and I'm a reporter with The Hill. I'm reaching out to see if the BOP has any comment on this report (https://www.nydailynews.com/new-york/ny-inmate-at-mcc-mistakenly-released-after-jeffrey-epstein-suicide-20190815-h2r76qxnfcodp225goyte6y7a-story.html) that convicted bank robber (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) was mistakenly released on Aug. 7; he is still listed as "released" in the "find an inmate" portal as of 10:21 on Thursday.

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as (b)(6), (b)(7)(C), and (b)(5). The redactions are likely related to personal information and internal communication.
